title: Download Replay URL (for sharing)
body: is there a way to download replays via the web? i'm mainly looking for a way to get the URL of the replay to share with friends so i don't have to get the email address of each and every one i want to share a replay with? like http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/replays/NA1-26264xxxxx.rofl or something. or is it a complete random address for every replay?

replies.body: We don't have those replays on any hosted website, and afaik the only way to share them is to make a highlight out of it and send that over to your friends.
